metadata.title: CVE-2016-3616 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The cjpeg utility in libjpeg allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> only affects the cjpeg tool, which isn't shipped in libjpeg6b

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.1-0ubuntu1').
libjpeg9 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9b-2').
